name: Jungle Bloom V0.1
description:
Jungle Bloom is a puzzle game developed for 1st Game Jam Univali + XANK where you control a goblin shaman who likes to eat the sweetest apples in the forest, but be careful,  it's dangerous to walk inside the mystery jungle.

We tried to show how the theme assemble/disassemble is linked with bloom and "wilt". Inside the game, you can turn into night and bloom some mushrooms or back into the daylight and face some spikes also looking for your precious apples.

Developers:
Mateus dos Santos Heinz - Pixel art/Level Design

Nicolas Schussler Gayer - Programmer/Soundtrack

Enjoy :D

Third-Party Assets Used
In-game music : https://www.looperman.com/loops/detail/289892/shroom-trip-free-99bpm-jungle-synth-loop

all game font: https://www.dafont.com/pt/pixelfy.font
